body.section: Hierarchy HL73ConceptDescriptor is a kind of NullableCode

section.title: Description
section.p: "A reference to a concept defined in a code system" - HL7 V3

stentry.p: code : String (1..1)
"The plain code symbol defined by the code system, or an expression in a syntax defined by the code system which describes the concept." - HL7 V3
codeSystem : String (1..1)
"The code system that defines the code." - HL7 V3
codeSystemName : String (1..1)
"The common name of the coding system." - HL7 V3
codeSystemVersion : String (0..1)
"If applicable, a version descriptor defined specifically for the given code system." - HL7 V3
codingRationale : String (0..*)
"The reason a particular CD has been provided. " - HL7 V3
displayName : String (1..1)
"A name, title, or representation for the code or expression as it exists in the code system identified by the value of codeSystem." - HL7 V3
originalText : String (1..1)
"The text as seen and/or selected by the user who entered the data which represents the intended meaning of the user." - HL7 V3
source : HL73ConceptDescriptor (0..1)
"The CD from which this CD was translated, if it was translated from another CD." - HL7 V3
translation : HL73ConceptDescriptor (0..*)
"A set of other CDs that each represent a translation of this CD into equivalent codes within the same code system or into corresponding concepts from other code systems." - HL7 V3
valueSet : String (1..1)
"The value set that applied when this CD was created." - HL7 V3
valueSetVersion : String (0..1)
"The version of the value set that applied when this CD was created" - HL7 V3
